title: This is r%%%%%ed!!
body:
I stop playing this game cause I got a 20 min low priority but now i come back and think ill be able to play the fun mode with friend but nope all i get are r%%%%%ed error messages ive changed everything to defaults I changed resolution and all I get are errors so am I going to have to wait 20 mins again on my last low priority again or what?

I jsut got put back in 5 low priority again for 20 mins, I dont understand how im getting punished for this but when i report people that will leave in the middle of a ranked game they wont get a ban their is no justice or logic to this system. I've been playing league for a year now and I've tried my best to not afk and i mean i understand last time why io got low prior this time i dont understand

replies.body: I'd love to help out with that error you're getting, but there's a number of different things that could be going on. Hit me back with what kind of error messages you're seeing and I should be able to help!
it let me play on my old computer but it seems it has to do with resolution? is there something you can do to fix and maybe lift my stupid ban?
What's the actual error message that you're getting, or do you happen to have a screenshot of the issue when it happened? I can't troubleshoot much without knowing what happened.
it seems that it was the resolution I had to go in the files and change it, thank you for trying to help though i appreciate it.
